Reviews.Title: “Won't be coming back”

Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights december wont coming dingy outdated heater loud sink cracks black stains replaced breakfast crowded filled surplus tvs donuts day coffee juice ok

Reviews.Content: checked pay 111 nights ac unplugged found knob missing pull switches bathroom door looked cheap bathtub handle missing exposed holes bathtub time sleep pulled sheets found urine stain inside sheet checked told desk rolled eyes didnt care stay motel
